title: Thlalera vak ka lo nih hi
lyrics:
Thlalera vak ka lo nih hi,
Ding leh vei bo tawnin;
Ka Pa in a lo hnai a ni,
Tiin ka beisei thin.

Ka hmaa van thleng aw mawi ri,
Hriat phakin ka ngai fo;
Kawngan engkimah an chhuak si
Buai leh pik an hneh zo.

Thlarau thianghlim, kawn hmuhtir la,
Chhum leh mei awm ang che;
Pen khat pawh ka kal dik lo vang,
Hmahruai I nih loh leh.

A Changin ding lam ka peng ang,
A chang pawh vei laman;
Tichuan, pen zelin min kai la,
Paradis ram thleng chuan.

Chu chuan ka lung a len the e,
Chhiar sen loh awmna khian;
Kalvari thihna chawimawite,
Pawl da duh, fak ve nan.
